author: Rafael Bernal
title: Texas House Dems ask governor to issue stay-at-home order
description: Twelve of the thirteen Texas House Democrats on Wednesday asked Gov. Greg Abbott (R) to issue a statewide stay-at-home order as U.S. coronavirus cases surged past 200,000.The Texas Democrats, led by Rep. Filemón Ve...
content:
Twelve of the thirteen Texas House Democrats on Wednesday asked Gov. Greg Abbott (R) to issue a statewide stay-at-home order as U.S. coronavirus cases surged past 200,000.
The Texas Democrats, led by Rep. Filemón Vela, asked Abbott to follow the examples of … [+3378 chars]
